title: Number field "phone" has pattern validation
explanation: Field "phone" has type="number" but validation.pattern="^\+?[1-9]\d{1,14}$". Pattern validation only works on strings. For number fields, use min/max/step instead. Current pattern will be ignored by browsers.
fixGuidance: If you need pattern (e.g., "must be 3 digits"), change type to "text" or "tel"
For formatted numbers (e.g., phone), use type="tel" with pattern instead of type="number"

title: Placeholder API endpoint detected
explanation: submitConfig.endpoint uses "api.example.com" which is a documentation placeholder, not a real API. Forms will fail to submit. This usually means the config was copied from a template and the endpoint wasn't updated. Replace with your actual API URL.
fixGuidance: For testing, use free APIs: "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts" or "https://httpbin.org/post"
If intentional placeholder, add comment: // TODO: Replace with production API before deployment
